description:
Let`s continue to learn Shogi! In this episode, we`ll also discover a little more about Rei`s Father, and not to mention that special guest he has...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Apprends-moi le shogi (préface) / Visage / Tonnerre lointain - 1
Teach Me How to Play Shogi (Continued) / Image / Distant Thunder (Part 1)
علمني كيف ألعب الشوغي (تتمة) / صورة / الصاعقة البعيدة (الجزء 1)
将棋おしえて (承前) / 面影 / 遠雷①
장기 가르쳐 줘 (이어서) / 기억 속의 얼굴 / 먼 하늘의 번개 ①
